experience: You and Amy both know Steve McVey, James Jacob, and 10 others

Direct a staffing program and manage 75+ vendors in providing supplemental clinical and non-clinical resources in support of 100+ member hospitals across the state. Ensure total vendor compliance by performing audits to mitigate risk and thwart noncompliance. Facilitate vendor onboarding and training to ensure complete understanding of member requirements, expectations and contractual obligations.

Recognized with the Innovation and Excellence Award for efforts coordinating the recruitment of licensed attorneys, legal staff and qualified legal interns and externs. Worked with law schools and AG office attorneys to drive the recruitment and screening process, serving as a primary contact for all legal applicants during recruiting and onboarding phases. Coordinated CLE programs and seminars for a team of up to 400, holding accountability for preparing programs for Continuing Legal Education credit approval.

Promoted from level 1 to level 2 before the end of year two, demonstrating strengths in personnel administration, process coordination, and management reporting. Oversaw the disability benefit program, completed documentation for the Department of Administrative Services, and communicated with employees regarding key deadlines and approval or denial of claims. Managed FMLA program and policies, communicated leave of absence information, and ensured accurate payroll processing.
